mapper.select: select ic.icd_name,ec.onset_time from electronic_case ec inner join electronic_case_detailed dpd on ec.case_no=dpd.case_no inner join icd ic on dpd.icd_id=ic.icd_id where ec.patient_id=#{patientId}
select t2.icd_id from electronic_case t1 INNER JOIN electronic_case_detailed t2 on t1.case_no=t2.case_no where t1.uid=#{uid} GROUP BY t2.icd_id ORDER BY COUNT(1) desc limit 5

select icd_id,icd_name,icd_code from icd where
icd_id=#{id}
